name: bnomei/kirby3-htmlhead
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for a best-practice HTML Head Element extendable with snippets.

scripts.zip: rm kirby3-handlebars.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-handlebars; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
